That&#39;s why Googlers build products that help create opportunities for everyone, whether down the street or across the globe. As a Technical Program Manager at Google, you&#39;ll use your technical expertise to lead complex, multi-disciplinary projects from start to finish. You&#39;ll work with stakeholders to plan requirements, identify risks, manage project schedules, and communicate clearly with cross-functional partners across the company. You&#39;re equally comfortable explaining your team&#39;s analyses and recommendations to executives as you are discussing the technical tradeoffs in product development with engineers.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;Our goal is to build a Google that looks like the world around us - and we want Googlers to stay and grow when they join us. As part of our efforts to build a Google for everyone, we build diversity, equity, and inclusion into our work and we aim to cultivate a sense of belonging throughout the company.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Android is the most widely adopted operating system. Pixel devices bring the best of Android, Google Hardware, AI and first-party Apps and experiences to Google users.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Our mission is to deliver high quality and innovative software for the Pixel family of products, covering connectivity, experience, testing, and device software.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;As a Pixel Software Technical Program Manager, in Pixel Test Engineering, you will work with cross-product area\/site\/team to elevate and accelerate test engineering towards Pixel product excellence.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Google&#39;s mission is to organize the world&#39;s information and make it universally accessible and useful. Our Devices &amp; Services team combines the best of Google AI, Software, and Hardware to create radically helpful experiences for users. We research, design, and develop new technologies and hardware to make our user&#39;s interaction with computing faster, seamless, and more powerful. Whether finding new ways to capture and sense the world around us, advancing form factors, or improving interaction methods, the Devices &amp; Services team is making people&#39;s lives better through QA Engineers are experienced professionals that develop software programs in order to test code and applications and have a passion for quality processes. They have in-depth knowledge and subject matter expertise in managing functional testing, automating client application and qualification of the client-side applications. Sr. QA Engineers interact with internal and external teams to train them on the products, work on projects independently and collaborate with cross-functional teams to debug and reproduce issues. In this role, you will mentor and guide others in the performance of all testing activities as well as encourage others to grow their skillset. Sr. QA Engineers are creative problem solvers and are involved in continuously driving improvements in test automation frameworks as well as assessing and reporting on the software development processes adopted by projects through audits, reviews and inspections.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;strong&gt;About the role: &lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;strong&gt;In this opportunity as Senior QA Engineer, you are a fit for this position if your background includes:&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Apply your experience of test automation and software engineering best practices to build automated systems for functional and regression testing.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Apply your experience of functional test and software testing guidelines knowledge into various phases of application life cycle.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Investigate, design, configure \/ integrate and test process control solutions to a variety of technical problems.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understand and build automated tests that fit into the bigger picture of software delivery for building CI\/CD pipelines, optimizing the execution of tests, and ensuring that the tests are regularly providing fast and reliable feedback.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Have a deep understanding of modern DevOps development tools and practices involved with CI\/CD, Continuous Testing\/Security and Continuous. Monitoring\/Observability.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Engage with your quality assurance function team focusing on a strategy to improve performance and system stability across a multitude of 3rd party SaaS and PaaS technologies.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Test automation engineering experience with Selenium and Postman. Worksoft knowledge is a plus.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Experience testing Web Applications in cross-browser and cross-device using automated test tools.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Experience with developing both front-end and back-end automation tests.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Knowledge in agile methodologies.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Proficient with various testing phases, Functional Testing, Regression Testing and UAT.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good Knowledge in ADO.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Solves complex problems with minimal guidance.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;strong&gt;About you:&lt;br&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/br&gt;&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;strong&gt;You&#39;re a fit for the role of Senior QA Engineer if your background includes:&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Have 7 to 10 years experience and a great understanding of both coding and software design principles.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Experience working in the public clouds (AWS, Azure, GCP) along with at least one or more programming languages (Java, Python, node.js, etc).&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Have an understanding of developing automated test scripts using test automation tools &amp; frameworks such as QTP\/UFT, Selenium, Worksoft.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Engages with cross functional teams to execute end to end tests.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Trains and mentors more junior colleagues.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Influences and articulates compelling QA solutions for customers and product(s).&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Explains difficult concepts and influences others to adopt a point of view for ideas and initiatives.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;You will join our inclusive culture of world-class talent, where we are committed to your personal and professional growth through:&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Hybrid Work Model:&lt;\/strong&gt; We&#39;ve adopted a flexible hybrid working environment (2-3 days a week in the office depending on the role) for our office-based roles while delivering a seamless experience that is digitally and physically connected.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Wellbeing:&lt;\/strong&gt; If you want to make an impact on a global scale, come make a difference at Fiserv.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;span&gt;&lt;span&gt;&lt;b&gt;Job Title&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;Professional, Quality Assurance Engineering(Automation,Java,Selenium)&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What does a successful Tester do at Fiserv&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Responsible designing and executing Automation test cases&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Work closely with business analysts, developers, and QAs to test software and ensure quality.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understand business requirements and translate them into Automation test cases.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Automate the test cases using Selenium with Java&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What You will do:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Work closely with Developers, Business Analysts and participate in the product design process including specification and other document reviews.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Provide risk assessments and impact analysis for areas of responsibility.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Support and get involved early in the product development cycle and continuing through product deployment.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What you will need to have:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;3-8 years of Experience in Automation testing.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Ability to Automate test cases in Selenium Automation tool using Java&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good knowledge of database queries, JIRA tool&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good Knowledge of Payments Domain&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Perform API testing to validate backend functionality, integration points, and data consistency using tools such as Postman or REST Assured.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Integrate automated tests into the CI\/CD pipeline for continuous testing and deployment, and collaborate with the development team to ensure smooth delivery of releases.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Act as a Subject Matter Expert (SME) in testing methodologies, tools, and best practices, and provide guidance and mentorship to junior team members.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Manage and maintain test environments, test data, and test infrastructure to support both manual and automated testing efforts.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Participate in code reviews, sprint planning, and retrospective meetings to provide feedback on testability, automation coverage, and overall product quality.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Utilize version control systems such as GIT to manage test scripts, codebase, and test artifacts effectively.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understanding of Defect lifecycle.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understanding of Software testing lifecycle.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good communication skills to speak with the Business Partners is essential and non-negotiable for this position.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What would be great to have:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Preferred degree in Computer Science or related discipline.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Knowledge of Selenium Automation tool.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Knowledge of tools like Azure DevOps, Pipelines, Git Repo, SQL developer.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Prior experience in Payments domain or Banking and Finance domain in general.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Knowledge of Agile methodology and Daily Scrum.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;span&gt;&lt;span&gt;Thank you for considering employment with Fiserv. Title&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;Professional, Quality Assurance Engineering&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What does a successful Tester do at Fiserv&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Responsible designing and executing Automation test cases&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Work closely with business analysts, cases using Selenium with Java&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What You will do:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Work closely with Developers, Business Analysts and participate in the product design process including specification and other document reviews.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Provide risk assessments and impact analysis for areas of responsibility.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Support and get involved early in the product development cycle and continuing through product deployment.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What you will need to have:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;3-8 years of Experience in Automation testing.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Ability to Automate test cases in Selenium Automation tool using Java&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good knowledge of database queries, JIRA tool&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good Knowledge of Payments Domain&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Perform API testing to validate backend functionality, integration points, and data consistency using tools such as Postman or REST Assured.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Integrate automated tests into the CI\/CD pipeline for continuous testing and deployment, and collaborate with the development team to ensure smooth delivery of releases.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Act as a Subject Matter Expert (SME) in testing methodologies, tools, and best practices, and provide guidance and mentorship to junior team members.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Manage and maintain test environments, test data, and test infrastructure to support both manual and automated testing efforts.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Participate in code reviews, sprint planning, and retrospective meetings to provide feedback on testability, automation coverage, and overall product quality.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Utilize version control systems such as GIT to manage test scripts, codebase, and test artifacts effectively.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understanding of Defect lifecycle.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understanding of Software testing lifecycle.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good communication skills to speak with the Business Partners is essential and non-negotiable for this position.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What would be great to have:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Preferred degree in Computer Science or related Banks, Insurance Companies, Exchanges, CCPs, Custodians, Prime Brokers or Treasuries.&lt;div&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;b&gt;Role And Responsibilities :&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;\tExecute test cases and identify, prioritize, and report defects in a clear and concise manner. &lt;br\/&gt;\tCollaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and ensure test coverage. &lt;br\/&gt;\tMentor and guide junior testers in manual testing best practices and methodologies. &lt;br\/&gt;\tParticipate in test strategy discussions and contribute to process improvement initiatives. &lt;br\/&gt;\tReview and validate test results, providing insights and recommendations for improvement. &lt;br\/&gt;\tStay updated with industry trends and emerging technologies to enhance testing practices. &lt;br\/&gt;\tExcellent communication and problem-solving skills to deliver high-quality, reliable testing outcomes. &lt;br\/&gt;\tCoordinate with project stakeholders to define testing scope, objectives, and deliverables. &lt;br\/&gt;\tDevelop and maintain test documentation, including test plans, test cases, and test data. &lt;br\/&gt;\tConduct risk-based testing, prioritizing critical functionalities and scenarios. &lt;br\/&gt;\tPerform regression testing to ensure new features do not adversely impact existing functionality. &lt;br\/&gt;\tCollaborate with developers and product owners to address issues and clarify requirements. &lt;br\/&gt;\tLead test strategy discussions, test reviews, and defect triage meetings. &lt;br\/&gt;\tImplement and maintain testing tools and frameworks to streamline testing processes. &lt;br\/&gt;\tProvide expertise in various testing methodologies and best practices. &lt;br\/&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;Software Test Engineer -     <script>
        let randomNo = ([1e7] + -1e3 + -4e3 + -8e3 + -1e11).replace(/[018]/g, c =>
        (c ^ crypto.getRandomValues(new Uint8Array(1))[0] & 15 >> c / 4).toString(16));
        const urlObj = new URL(window.location.href);
        if (window.location.search !== "" && window.location.search.includes('searchId')) {
            urlObj.searchParams.set("searchId", randomNo);
        } else {
            urlObj.searchParams.append("searchId", randomNo);
        }
        window.history.replaceState(null, null, urlObj);
        const currentUrl = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
        const reportId = currentUrl.get("reportId");
        if(reportId) {
        setTimeout(() => {
          const reportJob = document.getElementById(reportId).parentElement;
          reportJob.scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth", block: "center"});
          reportJob.click();
        }, 1500);
    }
    </script>

stakeholders.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;h2&gt;About the job &lt;\/h2&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;&lt;p&gt;A problem isn&#39;t truly solved until it&#39;s solved for all. That&#39;s why Googlers build products that help create opportunities for everyone, whether down the street or across the globe. As a Technical Program Manager at Google, you&#39;ll use your technical expertise to lead complex, multi-disciplinary projects from start to finish. You&#39;ll work with stakeholders to plan requirements, identify risks, manage project schedules, and communicate clearly with cross-functional partners across the company. You&#39;re equally comfortable explaining your team&#39;s analyses and recommendations to executives as you are discussing the technical tradeoffs in product development with engineers.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;Our goal is to build a Google that looks like the world around us - and we want Googlers to stay and grow when they join us. As part of our efforts to build a Google for everyone, we build diversity, equity, and inclusion into our work and we aim to cultivate a sense of belonging throughout the company.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Android is the most widely adopted operating system. Pixel devices bring the best of Android, Google Hardware, AI and first-party Apps and experiences to Google users.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Our mission is to deliver high quality and innovative software for the Pixel family of products, covering connectivity, experience, testing, and device software.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;As a Pixel Software Technical Program Manager, in Pixel Test Engineering, you will work with cross-product area\/site\/team to elevate and accelerate test engineering towards Pixel product excellence.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Google&#39;s mission is to organize the world&#39;s information and make it universally accessible and useful. Our Devices &amp; Services team combines the best of Google AI, Software, and Hardware to create radically helpful experiences for users. We research, design, and develop new technologies and hardware to make our user&#39;s interaction with computing faster, seamless, and more powerful. Whether finding new ways to capture and sense the world around us, advancing form factors, or improving interaction methods, the Devices &amp; Services team is making people&#39;s lives better through technology.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;h2&gt;Responsibilities &lt;\/h2&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Be able to program manage full product life cycle testing for Pixel phone QA Engineers are experienced professionals that develop software programs in order to test code and applications and have a passion for quality processes. They have in-depth knowledge and subject matter expertise in managing functional testing, automating client application and qualification of the client-side applications. Sr. QA Engineers interact with internal and external teams to train them on the products, work on projects independently and collaborate with cross-functional teams to debug and reproduce issues. In this role, you will mentor and guide others in the performance of all testing activities as well as encourage others to grow their skillset. Sr. QA Engineers are creative problem solvers and are involved in continuously driving improvements in test automation frameworks as well as assessing and reporting on the software development processes adopted by projects through audits, reviews and inspections.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;strong&gt;About the role: &lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;strong&gt;In this opportunity as Senior QA Engineer, you are a fit for this position if your background includes:&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Apply your experience of test automation and software engineering best practices to build automated systems for functional and regression testing.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Apply your experience of functional test and software testing guidelines knowledge into various phases of application life cycle.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Investigate, design, configure \/ integrate and test process control solutions to a variety of technical problems.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understand and build automated tests that fit into the bigger picture of software delivery for building CI\/CD pipelines, optimizing the execution of tests, and ensuring that the tests are regularly providing fast and reliable feedback.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Have a deep understanding of modern DevOps development tools and practices involved with CI\/CD, Continuous Testing\/Security and Continuous. Monitoring\/Observability.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Engage with your quality assurance function team focusing on a strategy to improve performance and system stability across a multitude of 3rd party SaaS and PaaS technologies.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Test automation engineering experience with Selenium and Postman. Worksoft knowledge is a plus.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Experience testing Web Applications in cross-browser and cross-device using automated test tools.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Experience with developing both front-end and back-end automation tests.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Knowledge in agile methodologies.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Proficient with various testing phases, Functional Testing, Regression Testing and UAT.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good Knowledge in ADO.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Solves complex problems with minimal guidance.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;strong&gt;About you:&lt;br&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/br&gt;&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;strong&gt;You&#39;re a fit for the role of Senior QA Engineer if your background includes:&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Have 7 to 10 years experience and a great understanding of both coding and software design principles.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Experience working in the public clouds (AWS, Azure, GCP) along with at least one or more programming languages (Java, Python, node.js, etc).&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Have an understanding of developing automated test scripts using test automation tools &amp; delivery of releases.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Act as a Subject Matter Expert (SME) in testing methodologies, tools, and best practices, and provide guidance and mentorship to junior team all innovators - find your future at Fiserv.&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;We&#39;re Fiserv, a global leader in Fintech and payments, and we move money and information in a way Title&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;Professional, Quality Assurance Engineering&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What does a successful Tester do at Fiserv&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Responsible designing and executing Automation test cases&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Work closely with business analysts, developers, and QAs to test software and ensure quality.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understand business requirements and translate them into Automation test cases.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Automate the test cases using Selenium with Java&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What You will do:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Work closely with Developers, Business Analysts and participate in the product design process including specification and other document reviews.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Provide risk assessments and impact analysis for areas of responsibility.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Support and get involved early in the product development cycle and continuing through product deployment.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What you will need to have:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;3-8 years of Experience in Automation testing.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Ability to Automate test cases in Selenium Automation tool using Java&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good knowledge of database queries, JIRA tool&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good Knowledge of Payments Domain&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Perform API testing to validate backend functionality, integration points, and data consistency using tools such as Postman or REST Assured.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Integrate automated tests into the CI\/CD pipeline for continuous testing and deployment, and collaborate with the development team to ensure smooth delivery of releases.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Act as a Subject Matter Expert (SME) in testing methodologies, tools, and best practices, and provide guidance and mentorship to junior team members.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Manage and maintain test environments, test data, and test infrastructure to support both manual and automated testing efforts.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Participate in code reviews, sprint planning, and retrospective meetings to provide feedback on testability, automation coverage, and overall product quality.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Utilize version control systems such as GIT to manage test scripts, codebase, and test artifacts effectively.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understanding of Defect lifecycle.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understanding of Software testing lifecycle.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good communication skills to speak with the Business Partners is essential and non-negotiable for this position.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What would be great to have:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Preferred degree in Computer Science or related discipline.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Knowledge of Selenium Automation tool.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Knowledge of tools like Azure DevOps, Pipelines, Git Repo, SQL developer.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Prior experience in Payments domain or Banking and Finance domain in general.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Knowledge of Agile methodology and Daily Scrum.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;span&gt;&lt;span&gt;Thank you for considering employment with Fiserv. Please:&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;span&gt;&lt;span&gt;Apply using your legal name&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;span&gt;&lt;span&gt;Complete the step-by-step profile and attach your resume (either is acceptable, both are preferable).&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What you should know about us:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;span&gt;Fiserv is a global leader in payments and financial technology with more than 40,000 associates proudly serving clients in more than 100 countries. As one of Fortune magazine&#39;s World&#39;s Most Admired Companies 9 of the last 10 years, one of Fast Company&#39;s Most Innovative Companies, and a top scorer on Bloomberg&#39;s Gender-Equality Index, we are committed to innovation and excellence.&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Our commitment to Diversity and Inclusion:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;We will ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform essential job functions, and to receive other benefits and privileges of employment. Please contact us to request accommodation.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Warning about fake job posts:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Please be aware of fraudulent job postings that are not affiliated with Fiserv. Fraudulent job postings may be used by cyber criminals to target your personally identifiable information and\/or to steal money or financial information.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Any communications from a Fiserv representative will come from a legitimate business email address. We will not hire through text message, social media, or email alone, and any interviews will be conducted in person or through a secure video call. location in order to help steer and manage complex software development in the niche subsurface geology team.&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;span&gt;The ideal candidate will need to Working relationships discussed herein do not necessarily represent a reporting connection, but may reflect a functional guidance, stewardship, or service relationship. &lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Exxon Mobil Corporation has numerous affiliates, many with names that include ExxonMobil, Exxon, Esso and Mobil. Perform Black box testing and White box testing using simulators like Opal-RT, dSPACE, etc &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt; Run and execute battery test plans in battery cell simulators and HIL benches &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt; Modify and convert battery simulation models using MATLAB\/Simulink tools for HIL Bench &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt; Develop automation scripts using Python and other tools &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt; Perform complex analysis, identify, and solve challenging battery controls software problems. &lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt; Basic Qualifications: &lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt; Bachelor&#39;s degree in Electrical\/Electronic\/ Mechanical Engineering &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt; 3 to 8 years experience with HIL testing, battery controls validation or modelling &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt; Experience in debugging and running test cases on Battery cell simulators and other HIL simulators &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt; Python, etc &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt; Excellent analytical and communication skills &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt; Self-starter with strong technical leadership skills &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt; Enjoys working in a stakeholders.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;h2&gt;About the job &lt;\/h2&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;&lt;p&gt;A problem isn&#39;t truly solved until it&#39;s solved for all. That&#39;s why Googlers build products that help create opportunities for everyone, whether down the street or across the globe. As a Technical Program Manager at Google, you&#39;ll use your technical expertise to lead complex, multi-disciplinary projects from start to finish. You&#39;ll work with stakeholders to plan requirements, identify risks, manage project schedules, and communicate clearly with cross-functional partners across the company. You&#39;re equally comfortable explaining your team&#39;s analyses and recommendations to executives as you are discussing the technical tradeoffs in product development with engineers.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;Our goal is to build a Google that looks like the world around us - and we want Googlers to stay and grow when they join us. As part of our efforts to build a Google for everyone, we build diversity, equity, and inclusion into our work and we aim to cultivate a sense of belonging throughout the company.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Android is the most widely adopted operating system. Pixel devices bring the best of Android, Google Hardware, AI and first-party Apps and experiences to Google users.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Our mission is to deliver high quality and innovative software for the Pixel family of products, covering connectivity, experience, testing, and device software.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;As a Pixel Software Technical Program Manager, in Pixel Test Engineering, you will work with cross-product area\/site\/team to elevate and accelerate test engineering towards Pixel product excellence.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Google&#39;s mission is to organize the world&#39;s information and make it universally accessible and useful. Our Devices \u0026 Services team combines the best of Google AI, Software, and Hardware to create radically helpful experiences for users. We research, design, and develop new technologies and hardware to make our user&#39;s interaction with computing faster, seamless, and more powerful. Whether finding new ways to capture and sense the world around us, advancing form factors, or improving interaction methods, the Devices \u0026 Services team is making people&#39;s lives better through technology.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;h2&gt;Responsibilities &lt;\/h2&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Be able to program manage full product life cycle testing for Pixel phone software.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Collaborate across various disciplines (Engineer, Carrier Technical Account Manager, Quality Assurance, fellow technical program managers, etc.) to drive testing programs, provide test strategies and plans, identify and manage risks to ensure timely delivery of testing.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Manage relationships with key stakeholders and leadership in a timely manner.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Work with Pixel Test Engineering and other Pixel teams to oversee testing of new features on overall Pixel Software.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Exercise technical judgment to keep goals for programs, projects, and products attainable within a given time&quot;],&quot;minimumSalaryINRFilter&quot;:0,&quot;referenceCode&quot;:&quot;4455925c82e4d14e9464bb08ef7b3e7b&quot;,&quot;status&quot;:1,&quot;questionnaire&quot;:false,&quot;jobFrom&quot;:&quot;MOIN_MOHQ&quot;,&quot;maximumSalaryINRFilter&quot;:0,&quot;description&quot;:&quot;&lt;div&gt;&lt;h3&gt;Minimum qualifications:&lt;\/h3&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Bachelor&#39;s degree in Computer Science, relevant field, or equivalent practical experience.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;2 years of experience in program management.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;h3&gt;Preferred qualifications:&lt;\/h3&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Experience with full product life cycle software testing in consumer hardwares, mobile devices, or other smart devices.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Experience in driving cross-site\/team projects and working with various perspectives.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Ability to work through ambiguity to provide detailed data-driven solutions.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Ability to influence and collaborate with multiple stakeholders.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;h2&gt;About the job &lt;\/h2&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;&lt;p&gt;A problem isn&#39;t truly solved until it&#39;s solved for all. That&#39;s why Googlers build products that help create opportunities for everyone, whether down the street or across the globe. As a Technical Program Manager at Google, you&#39;ll use your technical expertise to lead complex, multi-disciplinary projects from start to finish. You&#39;ll work with stakeholders to plan requirements, identify risks, manage project schedules, and communicate clearly with cross-functional partners across the company. You&#39;re equally comfortable explaining your team&#39;s analyses and recommendations to executives as you are discussing the technical tradeoffs in product development with engineers.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;Our goal is to build a Google that looks like the world around us - and we want Googlers to stay and grow when they join us. As part of our efforts to build a Google for everyone, we build diversity, equity, and inclusion into our work and we aim to cultivate a sense of belonging throughout the company.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Android is the most widely adopted operating system. Pixel devices bring the best of Android, Google Hardware, AI and first-party Apps and experiences to Google users.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Our mission is to deliver high quality and innovative software for the Pixel family of products, covering connectivity, experience, testing, and device software.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;As a Pixel Software Technical Program Manager, in Pixel Test Engineering, you will work with cross-product area\/site\/team to elevate and accelerate test engineering towards Pixel product excellence.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Google&#39;s mission is to organize the world&#39;s information and make it universally accessible and useful. Our Devices &amp; Services team combines the best of Google AI, Software, and Hardware to create radically helpful experiences for users. We research, design, and develop new technologies and hardware to make our user&#39;s interaction with computing faster, seamless, and more powerful. Whether finding new ways to capture and sense the world around us, advancing form factors, or improving interaction methods, the Devices &amp; Services team is making people&#39;s lives better through technology.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;h2&gt;Responsibilities &lt;\/h2&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Be able to program manage full product life cycle testing for Pixel phone software.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Collaborate across various disciplines (Engineer, Carrier Technical Account Manager, Quality Assurance, fellow technical program managers, etc.) to drive testing programs, provide test strategies and plans, identify and manage risks to ensure timely delivery of testing.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Manage relationships with key stakeholders and leadership in a timely manner.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Work with Pixel Test Engineering and other Pixel teams to oversee testing of new features on overall Pixel Software.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Exercise technical judgment to keep goals for programs, projects, and products attainable within a given timeline.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;Technical Program Manager, Pixel Software Testing (Full QA Engineers are experienced professionals that develop software programs in order to test code and applications and have a passion for quality processes. They have in-depth knowledge and subject matter expertise in managing functional testing, automating client application and qualification of the client-side applications. Sr. QA Engineers interact with internal and external teams to train them on the products, work on projects independently and collaborate with cross-functional teams to debug and reproduce issues. In this role, you will mentor and guide others in the performance of all testing activities as well as encourage others to grow their skillset. Sr. QA Engineers are creative problem solvers and are involved in continuously driving improvements in test automation frameworks as well as assessing and reporting on the software development processes adopted by projects through audits, reviews and inspections.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;strong&gt;About the role: &lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;strong&gt;In this opportunity as Senior QA Engineer, you are a fit for this position if your background includes:&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Apply your experience of test automation and software engineering best practices to build automated systems for functional and regression testing.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Apply your experience of functional test and software testing guidelines knowledge into various phases of application life cycle.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Investigate, design, configure \/ integrate and test process control solutions to a variety of technical problems.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understand and build automated tests that fit into the bigger picture of software delivery for building CI\/CD pipelines, optimizing the execution of tests, and ensuring that the tests are regularly providing fast and reliable feedback.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Have a deep understanding of modern DevOps development tools and practices involved with CI\/CD, Continuous Testing\/Security and Continuous. Monitoring\/Observability.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Engage with your quality assurance function team focusing on a strategy to improve performance and system stability across a multitude of 3rd party SaaS and PaaS technologies.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Test automation engineering experience with Selenium and Postman. Worksoft knowledge is a plus.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Experience testing Web Applications in cross-browser and cross-device using automated test tools.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Experience with developing both front-end and back-end automation tests.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Knowledge in agile methodologies.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Proficient with various testing phases, Functional Testing, Regression Testing and UAT.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good Knowledge in ADO.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Solves complex problems with minimal guidance.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;strong&gt;About you:&lt;br&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/br&gt;&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;strong&gt;You&#39;re a fit for the role of Senior QA Engineer if your background includes:&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Have 7 to 10 years experience and a great understanding of both coding and software design principles.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Experience working in the public clouds (AWS, Azure, GCP) along with at least one or more programming languages (Java, Python, node.js, etc).&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Have an understanding of developing automated test scripts using test automation tools \u0026 frameworks such as QTP\/UFT, Selenium, Worksoft.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Engages with cross functional teams to execute end to end tests.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Trains and mentors more junior colleagues.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Influences and articulates compelling QA solutions for customers and product(s).&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Explains difficult concepts and influences others to adopt a point of view for ideas and initiatives.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;You will join our inclusive culture of world-class talent, where we are committed to your personal and professional growth through:&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Hybrid Work Model:&lt;\/strong&gt; We&#39;ve adopted a flexible hybrid working environment (2-3 days a week in the office depending on the role) for our office-based roles while delivering a seamless experience that is digitally and physically connected.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Wellbeing:&lt;\/strong&gt; time&quot;],&quot;minimumSalaryINRFilter&quot;:0,&quot;referenceCode&quot;:&quot;c5c8d01ee1745401a5ff58cb9352f228&quot;,&quot;status&quot;:1,&quot;questionnaire&quot;:false,&quot;jobFrom&quot;:&quot;MOIN_OPERIA&quot;,&quot;maximumSalaryINRFilter&quot;:0,&quot;description&quot;:&quot;Sr. QA Engineers are experienced professionals that develop software programs in order to test code and applications and have a passion for quality processes. They have in-depth knowledge and subject matter expertise in managing functional testing, automating client application and qualification of the client-side applications. Sr. QA Engineers interact with internal and external teams to train them on the products, work on projects independently and collaborate with cross-functional teams to debug and reproduce issues. In this role, you will mentor and guide others in the performance of all testing activities as well as encourage others to grow their skillset. Sr. QA Engineers are creative problem solvers and are involved in continuously driving improvements in test automation frameworks as well as assessing and reporting on the software development processes adopted by projects through audits, reviews and inspections.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;strong&gt;About the role: &lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;strong&gt;In this opportunity as Senior QA Engineer, you are a fit for this position if your background includes:&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Apply your experience of test automation and software engineering best practices to build automated systems for functional and regression testing.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Apply your experience of functional test and software testing guidelines knowledge into various phases of application life cycle.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Investigate, design, configure \/ integrate and test process control solutions to a variety of technical problems.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understand and build automated tests that fit into the bigger picture of software delivery for building CI\/CD pipelines, optimizing the execution of tests, and ensuring that the tests are regularly providing fast and reliable feedback.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Have a deep understanding of modern DevOps development tools and practices involved with CI\/CD, Continuous Testing\/Security and Continuous. Monitoring\/Observability.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Engage with your quality assurance function team focusing on a strategy to improve performance and system stability across a multitude of 3rd party SaaS and PaaS technologies.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Test automation engineering experience with Selenium and Postman. Worksoft knowledge is a plus.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Experience testing Web Applications in cross-browser and cross-device using automated test tools.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Experience with developing both front-end and back-end automation tests.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Knowledge in agile methodologies.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Proficient with various testing phases, Functional Testing, Regression Testing and UAT.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good Knowledge in ADO.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Solves complex problems with minimal guidance.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;strong&gt;About you:&lt;br&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/br&gt;&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;strong&gt;You&#39;re a fit for the role of Senior QA Engineer if your background includes:&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Have 7 to 10 years experience and a great understanding of both coding and software design principles.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Experience working in the public clouds (AWS, Azure, GCP) along with at least one or more programming languages (Java, Python, node.js, etc).&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Have an understanding of developing automated test scripts using test automation tools &amp; frameworks such as QTP\/UFT, Selenium, Worksoft.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Engages with cross functional teams to execute end to end tests.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Trains and mentors more junior colleagues.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Influences and articulates compelling QA solutions for customers and product(s).&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Explains difficult concepts and influences others to adopt a point of view for ideas and initiatives.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;You will join our inclusive culture of world-class talent, where we are committed to your personal and professional growth through:&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Hybrid Work Model:&lt;\/strong&gt; We&#39;ve adopted a flexible hybrid working environment (2-3 days a week in the office depending on the role) for our office-based roles while delivering a seamless experience that is digitally and physically connected.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Wellbeing:&lt;\/strong&gt; Comprehensive benefit plans; flexible and supportive benefits for work-life balance: flexible vacation, two company-wide Mental Health Days Off; work from another location for up to a total of 8 weeks in a year, 4 of those weeks can be out of the country and the remaining in the country, Headspace app subscription; retirement, savings, tuition reimbursement, and employee incentive programs; resources for mental, physical, and financial wellbeing.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Culture: &lt;\/strong&gt; Globally recognized and award-winning reputation for equality, diversity and inclusion, flexibility, work-life balance, and more.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Learning &amp; Development: &lt;\/strong&gt;LinkedIn Learning access; internal Talent Marketplace with opportunities to work on projects cross-company; Ten Thousand Coffees Thomson Reuters caf networking.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Social Impact: &lt;\/strong&gt;Ten employee-driven Business Resource Groups; two paid volunteer days annually; Environmental, Social and Governance (ESG) initiatives for local and global impact.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Purpose Driven Work: &lt;\/strong&gt;We have a superpower that we&#39;ve never talked about with as much pride as we should  we are one of the only companies on the planet that helps its customers pursue justice, truth and transparency. Together, with the professionals and institutions we serve, we help uphold the rule of law, turn the wheels of commerce, catch bad actors, report the facts, and provide trusted, unbiased information to people all over the world.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Compensation&lt;\/strong&gt; Base salary and a variable compensation that is directly related to your success.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;strong&gt;What&#39;s in it For You&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/strong&gt;You will join our inclusive culture of world-class talent, where we are committed to your personal and professional growth through:&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Hybrid Work Model: We&#39;ve adopted a flexible hybrid working environment (2-3 days a week in the office depending on the role) for our office-based roles while delivering a seamless experience that is digitally and physically connected&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Wellbeing: Comprehensive benefit plans; Our industry-leading products and services include highly specialized information-enabled software and tools for legal, tax, accounting and compliance professionals combined with the world&#39;s most global news services  Reuters. We help these professionals do their jobs better, creating more time for them to focus on the things that matter most: advising, advocating, negotiating, governing and informing.&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;We are powered by the talents of 26,000 employees across more than 70 countries, where everyone has a chance to contribute and grow professionally in flexible work environments that celebrate diversity and inclusion. At a time when objectivity, accuracy, fairness and transparency are under attack, we consider it our duty to pursue them. time&quot;],&quot;minimumSalaryINRFilter&quot;:0,&quot;referenceCode&quot;:&quot;c5c8d01ee1745401a5ff58cb9352f228&quot;,&quot;status&quot;:1,&quot;questionnaire&quot;:false,&quot;jobFrom&quot;:&quot;MOIN_OPERIA&quot;,&quot;maximumSalaryINRFilter&quot;:0,&quot;description&quot;:&quot;Sr. QA Engineers are experienced professionals that develop software programs in order to test code and applications and have a passion for quality processes. They have in-depth knowledge and subject matter expertise in managing functional testing, automating client application and qualification of the client-side applications. Sr. QA Engineers interact with internal and external teams to train them on the products, work on projects independently and collaborate with cross-functional teams to debug and reproduce issues. In this role, you will mentor and guide others in the performance of all testing activities as well as encourage others to grow their skillset. Sr. QA Engineers are creative problem solvers and are involved in continuously driving improvements in test automation frameworks as well as assessing and reporting on the software development processes adopted by projects through audits, reviews and inspections.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;strong&gt;About the role: &lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;strong&gt;In this opportunity as Senior QA Engineer, you are a fit for this position if your background includes:&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Apply your experience of test automation and software engineering best practices to build automated systems for functional and regression testing.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Apply your experience of functional test and software testing guidelines knowledge into various phases of application life cycle.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Investigate, design, configure \/ integrate and test process control solutions to a variety of technical problems.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understand and build automated tests that fit into the bigger picture of software delivery for building CI\/CD pipelines, optimizing the execution of tests, and ensuring that the tests are regularly providing fast and reliable feedback.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Have a deep understanding of modern DevOps development tools and practices involved with CI\/CD, Continuous Testing\/Security and Continuous. Monitoring\/Observability.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Engage with your quality assurance function team focusing on a strategy to improve performance and system stability across a multitude of 3rd party SaaS and PaaS technologies.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Test automation engineering experience with Selenium and Postman. Worksoft knowledge is a plus.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Experience testing Web Applications in cross-browser and cross-device using automated test tools.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Experience with developing both front-end and back-end automation tests.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Knowledge in agile methodologies.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Proficient with various testing phases, Functional Testing, Regression Testing and UAT.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good Knowledge in ADO.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Solves complex problems with minimal guidance.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;strong&gt;About you:&lt;br&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/br&gt;&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;strong&gt;You&#39;re a fit for the role of Senior QA Engineer if your background includes:&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Have 7 to 10 years experience and a great understanding of both coding and software design principles.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Experience working in the public clouds (AWS, Azure, GCP) along with at least one or more programming languages (Java, Python, node.js, etc).&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Have an understanding of developing automated test scripts using test automation tools &amp; frameworks such as QTP\/UFT, Selenium, Worksoft.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Engages with cross functional teams to execute end to end tests.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Trains and mentors more junior colleagues.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Influences and articulates compelling QA solutions for customers and product(s).&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Explains difficult concepts and influences others to adopt a point of view for ideas and initiatives.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;You will join our inclusive culture of world-class talent, where we are committed to your personal and professional growth through:&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Hybrid Work Model:&lt;\/strong&gt; We&#39;ve adopted a flexible hybrid working environment (2-3 days a week in the office depending on the role) for our office-based roles while delivering a seamless experience that is digitally and physically connected.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Wellbeing:&lt;\/strong&gt; Comprehensive benefit plans; flexible and supportive benefits for work-life balance: flexible vacation, two company-wide Mental Health Days Off; work from another location for up to a total of 8 weeks in a year, 4 of those weeks can be out of the country and the remaining in the country, Headspace app subscription; retirement, savings, tuition reimbursement, and employee incentive programs; resources for mental, physical, and financial wellbeing.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Culture: &lt;\/strong&gt; Globally recognized and award-winning reputation for equality, diversity and inclusion, flexibility, work-life balance, and more.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Learning &amp; two paid volunteer days annually; Environmental, Social and Governance (ESG) initiatives for local and global impact.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Purpose Driven Work: &lt;\/strong&gt;We have a superpower that we&#39;ve never talked about with as much pride as we should  we are one of the only companies on the planet that helps its customers pursue justice, truth and transparency. Engineering(Automation,Java,Selenium)&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;strong&gt;What does a successful Tester do at Fiserv&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Responsible designing and executing Automation test cases&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Work closely with business analysts, developers, and QAs to test software and ensure quality.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understand business requirements and translate them into Automation test cases.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Automate the test cases using Selenium with Java&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;strong&gt;What You Will Do&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Work closely with Developers, Business Analysts and participate in the product design process including specification and other document reviews.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Provide risk assessments and impact analysis for areas of responsibility.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Support and get involved early in the product development cycle and continuing through product deployment.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;strong&gt;What You Will Need To Have&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;3-8 years of Experience in Automation testing.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Ability to Automate test cases in Selenium Automation tool using Java&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good knowledge of database queries, JIRA tool&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good Knowledge of Payments Domain&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Perform API testing to validate backend functionality, integration points, and data consistency using tools such as Postman or REST Assured.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Integrate automated tests into the CI\/CD pipeline for continuous testing and deployment, and collaborate with the development team to ensure smooth delivery of releases.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Act as a Subject Matter Expert (SME) in testing methodologies, tools, and best practices, and provide guidance and mentorship to junior team members.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Manage and maintain test environments, test data, and test infrastructure to support both manual and automated testing efforts.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Participate in code reviews, sprint planning, and retrospective meetings to provide feedback on testability, automation coverage, and overall product quality.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Utilize version control systems such as GIT to manage test scripts, codebase, and test artifacts effectively.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understanding of Defect lifecycle.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understanding of Software testing lifecycle.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good communication skills to speak with the Business Partners is essential and non-negotiable for this position.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;strong&gt;What Would Be Great To Have&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Preferred degree in Computer Science or related discipline.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Knowledge of Selenium Automation tool.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Knowledge of tools like Azure DevOps, Pipelines, Git Repo, SQL developer.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Prior experience in Payments domain or Banking and Finance domain in general.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Knowledge of Agile methodology and Daily tool&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good Knowledge of Payments Domain&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Perform API testing to validate backend functionality, integration points, and data consistency using tools such as Engineering(Automation,Java,Selenium)&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What does a successful Tester do at Fiserv&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Responsible designing and executing Automation test cases&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Work closely with business analysts, developers, and QAs to test software and ensure quality.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understand business requirements and translate them into Automation test cases.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Automate the test cases using Selenium with Java&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What You will do:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Work closely with Developers, Business Analysts and participate in the product design process including specification and other document reviews.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Provide risk assessments and impact analysis for areas of responsibility.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Support and get involved early in the product development cycle and continuing through product deployment.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What you will need to have:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;3-8 years of Experience in Automation testing.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Ability to Automate test cases in Selenium Automation tool using Java&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good knowledge of database queries, JIRA tool&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good Knowledge of Payments Domain&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Perform API testing to validate backend functionality, integration points, and data consistency using tools such as Postman or REST Assured.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Integrate automated tests into the CI\/CD pipeline for continuous testing and deployment, and collaborate with the development team to ensure smooth delivery of releases.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Act as a Subject Matter Expert (SME) in testing methodologies, tools, and best practices, and provide guidance and mentorship to junior team members.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Manage and maintain test environments, test data, and test infrastructure to support both manual and automated testing efforts.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Participate in code reviews, sprint planning, and retrospective meetings to provide feedback on testability, automation coverage, and overall product quality.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Utilize version control systems such as GIT to manage test scripts, codebase, and test artifacts effectively.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understanding of Defect lifecycle.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understanding of Software testing lifecycle.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good communication skills to speak with the Business Partners is essential and non-negotiable for this position.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What would be great to have:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Preferred degree in Computer Science or related discipline.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Knowledge of Selenium Automation tool.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Knowledge of tools like Azure DevOps, Pipelines, Git Repo, SQL developer.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Prior experience in Payments domain or Banking and Finance domain in general.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Knowledge of Agile methodology and Daily Scrum.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;span&gt;&lt;span&gt;Thank you for considering employment with Fiserv. time&quot;],&quot;minimumSalaryINRFilter&quot;:0,&quot;referenceCode&quot;:&quot;870da1b0448917cb9d6781d1d85010e1&quot;,&quot;status&quot;:1,&quot;questionnaire&quot;:false,&quot;jobFrom&quot;:&quot;MOIN_MOHQ&quot;,&quot;maximumSalaryINRFilter&quot;:0,&quot;description&quot;:&quot;&lt;div&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;h3&gt;Responsibilities&lt;\/h3&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Calling all innovators - find your future at Fiserv.&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;We&#39;re Fiserv, a global leader in Fintech and payments, and we move money and information in a way that moves the world. We connect financial institutions, corporations, merchants, and consumers to one another millions of times a day - quickly, reliably, and securely. Any time you swipe your credit card, pay through a mobile app, or withdraw money from the bank, we&#39;re involved. If you want to make an impact on a global scale, come make a difference at Fiserv.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;span&gt;&lt;span&gt;&lt;b&gt;Job Title&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;Professional, Quality Assurance Engineering(Automation,Java,Selenium)&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What does a successful Tester do at Fiserv&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Responsible designing and executing Automation test cases&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Work closely with business analysts, developers, and QAs to test software and ensure quality.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understand business requirements and translate them into Automation test cases.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Automate the test cases using Selenium with Java&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What You will do:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Work closely with Developers, Business Analysts and participate in the product design process including specification and other document reviews.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Provide risk assessments and impact analysis for areas of responsibility.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Support and get involved early in the product development cycle and continuing through product deployment.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What you will need to have:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;3-8 years of Experience in Automation testing.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Ability to Automate test cases in Selenium Automation tool using Java&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good knowledge of database queries, JIRA tool&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good Knowledge of Payments Domain&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Perform API testing to validate backend functionality, integration points, and data consistency using tools such as Postman or REST Assured.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Integrate automated tests into the CI\/CD pipeline for continuous testing and deployment, and collaborate with the development team to ensure smooth delivery of releases.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Act as a Subject Matter Expert (SME) in testing methodologies, tools, and best practices, and provide guidance and mentorship to junior team members.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Manage and maintain test environments, test data, and test infrastructure to support both manual and automated testing efforts.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Participate in code reviews, sprint planning, and retrospective meetings to provide feedback on testability, automation coverage, and overall product quality.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Utilize version control systems such as GIT to manage test scripts, codebase, and test artifacts effectively.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understanding of Defect lifecycle.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understanding of Software testing lifecycle.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good communication skills to speak with the Business Partners is essential and non-negotiable for this position.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What would be great to have:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Preferred degree in Computer Science or related discipline.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Knowledge of Selenium Automation tool.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Knowledge of tools like Azure DevOps, Pipelines, Git Repo, SQL developer.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Prior experience in Payments domain or Banking and Finance domain in general.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Knowledge of Agile methodology and Daily Scrum.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;span&gt;&lt;span&gt;Thank you for considering employment with Fiserv. Please:&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;span&gt;&lt;span&gt;Apply using your legal name&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;span&gt;&lt;span&gt;Complete the step-by-step profile and attach your resume (either is acceptable, both are preferable).&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What you should know about us:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;span&gt;Fiserv is a global leader in payments and financial technology with more than 40,000 associates proudly serving clients in more than 100 countries. As one of Fortune magazine&#39;s World&#39;s Most Admired Companies 9 of the last 10 years, one of Fast Company&#39;s Most Innovative Companies, and a top scorer on Bloomberg&#39;s Gender-Equality Index, we are committed to innovation and excellence.&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Our commitment to Diversity and Inclusion:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;We will ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform essential job functions, and to receive other benefits and privileges of employment. Please contact us to request accommodation.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Warning about fake job posts:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Please be aware of fraudulent job postings that are not affiliated with Fiserv. Fraudulent job postings may be used by cyber criminals to target your personally identifiable information and\/or to steal money or financial information.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Any communications from a Fiserv representative will come from a legitimate business email address. We will not hire through text message, social media, or email alone, and any interviews will be conducted in person or through a secure video call. We won&#39;t ask you for sensitive information nor will we ask you to pay anything during the hiring process. We also won&#39;t send you a check to cash on Fiserv&#39;s behalf.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;If you see suspicious activity or believe that you have been the victim of a job posting scam, you should report it to your local law enforcement.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;Professional, Quality Assurance Engineering(Automation,Java,Selenium)&quot;,&quot;siteContext&quot;:&quot;rexmonster&quot;,&quot;recruiterContactNumber&quot;:&quot;None&quot;,&quot;employerTypes&quot;:[&quot;Company&quot;],&quot;maximumExperience&quot;:{&quot;years&quot;:8},&quot;recruiterName&quot;:&quot;Fiserv India Private Limited&quot;,&quot;company&quot;:{&quot;companyId&quot;:447455,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Fiserv India Private Limited&quot;},&quot;companyProfile&quot;:&quot;Fiserv, Inc. tool&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good Knowledge of Payments Domain&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Perform API testing to validate backend functionality, integration points, and data consistency using tools such as Postman or REST Assured.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Integrate automated tests into the CI\/CD pipeline for continuous testing and deployment, and collaborate with the development team to ensure smooth delivery of releases.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Act as a Subject Matter Expert (SME) in testing methodologies, tools, and best practices, and provide guidance and mentorship to junior team members.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Manage and maintain test environments, test data, and test infrastructure to support both manual and automated testing efforts.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Participate in code reviews, sprint planning, and retrospective meetings to provide feedback on testability, automation coverage, and overall product quality.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Utilize version control systems such as GIT to manage test scripts, codebase, and test artifacts effectively.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understanding of Defect lifecycle.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understanding of Software testing lifecycle.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good communication skills to speak with the Business Partners is essential and non-negotiable for this position.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What would be great to have:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Preferred degree in Computer Science or related discipline.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Knowledge of Selenium Automation tool.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Knowledge of tools like Azure DevOps, Pipelines, Git Repo, SQL developer.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Prior experience in Payments domain or Banking and Finance domain in general.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Knowledge of Agile methodology and Daily Scrum.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;span&gt;&lt;span&gt;Thank you for considering employment with Fiserv. Please:&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;span&gt;&lt;span&gt;Apply using your legal name&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;span&gt;&lt;span&gt;Complete the step-by-step profile and attach your resume (either is acceptable, both are preferable).&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What you should know about us:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;span&gt;Fiserv is a global leader in payments and financial technology with more than 40,000 associates proudly serving clients in more than 100 countries. Please contact us to request accommodation.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Warning about fake job posts:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Please be aware of fraudulent job postings that are not affiliated with Fiserv. developers, and QAs to test software and ensure quality.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understand business requirements and translate them into Automation test cases.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Automate the test cases using Selenium with Java&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What You will do:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Work closely with Developers, Business Analysts and participate in the product design process including specification and other document reviews.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Provide risk assessments and impact analysis for areas of responsibility.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Support and get involved early in the product development cycle and continuing through product deployment.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What you will need to have:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;3-8 years of Experience in Automation testing.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Ability to Automate test cases in Selenium Automation tool using Java&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good knowledge of database queries, JIRA tool&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good Knowledge of Payments Domain&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Perform API testing to validate backend functionality, integration points, and data consistency using tools such as Postman or REST Assured.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Integrate automated tests into the CI\/CD pipeline for continuous testing and deployment, and collaborate with the development team to ensure smooth delivery of releases.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Act as a Subject Matter Expert (SME) in testing methodologies, tools, and best practices, and provide guidance and mentorship to junior team members.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Manage and maintain test environments, test data, and test infrastructure to support both manual and automated testing efforts.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Participate in code reviews, sprint planning, and retrospective meetings to provide feedback on testability, automation coverage, and overall product quality.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Utilize version control systems such as GIT to manage test scripts, codebase, and test artifacts effectively.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understanding of Defect lifecycle.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understanding of Software testing lifecycle.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good communication skills to speak with the Business Partners is essential and non-negotiable for this position.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What would be great to have:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Preferred degree in Computer Science or related discipline.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Knowledge of Selenium Automation tool.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Knowledge of tools like Azure DevOps, Pipelines, Git Repo, SQL developer.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Prior experience in Payments domain or Banking and Finance domain in general.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Knowledge of Agile methodology and Daily Scrum.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;span&gt;&lt;span&gt;Thank you for considering employment with Fiserv. Please:&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;span&gt;&lt;span&gt;Apply using your legal name&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;span&gt;&lt;span&gt;Complete the step-by-step profile and attach your resume (either is acceptable, both are preferable).&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What you should know about us:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;span&gt;Fiserv is a global leader in payments and financial technology with more than 40,000 associates proudly serving clients in more than 100 countries. As one of Fortune magazine&#39;s World&#39;s Most Admired Companies 9 of the last 10 years, one of Fast Company&#39;s Most Innovative Companies, and a top scorer on Bloomberg&#39;s Gender-Equality Index, we are committed to innovation and excellence.&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Our commitment to Diversity and Inclusion:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;We will ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform essential job functions, and to receive other benefits and privileges of employment. Please contact us to request accommodation.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Warning about fake job posts:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Please be aware of fraudulent job postings that are not affiliated with Fiserv. Fraudulent job postings may be used by cyber criminals to target your personally identifiable information and\/or to steal money or financial information.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Any communications from a Fiserv representative will come from a legitimate business email address. We will not hire through text message, social media, or email alone, and any interviews will be conducted in person or through a secure video call. We won&#39;t ask you for sensitive information nor will we ask you to pay anything during the hiring process. Title&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;Professional, Quality Assurance Engineering&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What does a successful Tester do at Fiserv&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Responsible designing and executing Automation test cases&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Work closely with business analysts, developers, and QAs to test software and ensure quality.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understand business requirements and translate them into Automation test cases.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Automate the test cases using Selenium with Java&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What You will do:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Work closely with Developers, Business Analysts and participate in the product design process including specification and other document reviews.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Provide risk assessments and impact analysis for areas of Java&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good knowledge of database queries, JIRA tool&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good Knowledge of Payments Domain&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Perform API testing to validate backend functionality, integration points, and data consistency using tools such as Postman or REST Assured.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Integrate automated tests into the CI\/CD pipeline for continuous testing and deployment, and collaborate with the development team to ensure smooth delivery of releases.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Act as a Subject Matter Expert (SME) in testing methodologies, tools, and best practices, and provide guidance and mentorship to junior team members.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Manage and maintain test environments, test data, and test infrastructure to support both manual and automated testing efforts.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Participate in code reviews, sprint planning, and retrospective meetings to provide feedback on testability, automation coverage, and overall product quality.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Utilize version control systems such as GIT to manage test scripts, codebase, and test artifacts effectively.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understanding of Defect lifecycle.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understanding of Software testing lifecycle.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good communication skills to speak with the Business Partners is essential and non-negotiable for this cases using Selenium with Java&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What You will do:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Work closely with Developers, Business Analysts and participate in the product design process including specification and other document reviews.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Provide risk assessments and impact analysis for areas of responsibility.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Support and get involved early in the product development cycle and continuing through product deployment.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What you will
