Java&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good knowledge of database queries, JIRA tool&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good Knowledge of Payments Domain&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Perform API testing to validate backend functionality, integration points, and data consistency using tools such as Postman or REST Assured.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Integrate automated tests into the CI\/CD pipeline for continuous testing and deployment, and collaborate with the development team to ensure smooth delivery of releases.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Act as a Subject Matter Expert (SME) in testing methodologies, tools, and best practices, and provide guidance and mentorship to junior team members.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Manage and maintain test environments, test data, and test infrastructure to support both manual and automated testing efforts.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Participate in code reviews, sprint planning, and retrospective meetings to provide feedback on testability, automation coverage, and overall product quality.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Utilize version control systems such as GIT to manage test scripts, codebase, and test artifacts effectively.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understanding of Defect lifecycle.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understanding of Software testing lifecycle.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good communication skills to speak with the Business Partners is essential and non-negotiable for this position.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What would be great to have:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Preferred degree in Computer Science or related That&#39;s why Googlers build products that help create opportunities for everyone, whether down the street or across the globe. As a Technical Program Manager at Google, you&#39;ll use your technical expertise to lead complex, multi-disciplinary projects from start to finish. You&#39;ll work with stakeholders to plan requirements, identify risks, manage project schedules, and communicate clearly with cross-functional partners across the company. You&#39;re equally comfortable explaining your team&#39;s analyses and recommendations to executives as you are discussing the technical tradeoffs in product development with engineers.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;Our goal is to build a Google that looks like the world around us - and we want Googlers to stay and grow when they join us. As part of our efforts to build a Google for everyone, we build diversity, equity, and inclusion into our work and we aim to cultivate a sense of belonging throughout the company.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Android is the most widely adopted operating system. Pixel devices bring the best of Android, Google Hardware, AI and first-party Apps and experiences to Google users.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Our mission is to deliver high quality and innovative software for the Pixel family of products, covering connectivity, experience, testing, and device software.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;As a Pixel Software Technical Program Manager, in Pixel Test Engineering, you will work with cross-product area\/site\/team to elevate and accelerate test engineering towards Pixel product excellence.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Google&#39;s mission is to organize the world&#39;s information and make it universally accessible and useful. Our Devices &amp; Services team combines the best of Google AI, Software, and Hardware to create radically helpful experiences for users. We research, design, and develop new technologies and hardware to make our user&#39;s interaction with computing faster, seamless, and more powerful. Whether finding new ways to capture and sense the world around us, advancing form factors, or improving interaction methods, the Devices &amp; Services team is making people&#39;s lives better through QA Engineers are experienced professionals that develop software programs in order to test code and applications and have a passion for quality processes. They have in-depth knowledge and subject matter expertise in managing functional testing, automating client application and qualification of the client-side applications. Sr. QA Engineers interact with internal and external teams to train them on the products, work on projects independently and collaborate with cross-functional teams to debug and reproduce issues. In this role, you will mentor and guide others in the performance of all testing activities as well as encourage others to grow their skillset. Sr. QA Engineers are creative problem solvers and are involved in continuously driving improvements in test automation frameworks as well as assessing and reporting on the software development processes adopted by projects through audits, reviews and inspections.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;strong&gt;About the role: &lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;strong&gt;In this opportunity as Senior QA Engineer, you are a fit for this position if your background includes:&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Apply your experience of test automation and software engineering best practices to build automated systems for functional and regression testing.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Apply your experience of functional test and software testing guidelines knowledge into various phases of application life cycle.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Investigate, design, configure \/ integrate and test process control solutions to a variety of technical problems.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understand and build automated tests that fit into the bigger picture of software delivery for building CI\/CD pipelines, optimizing the execution of tests, and ensuring that the tests are regularly providing fast and reliable feedback.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Have a deep understanding of modern DevOps development tools and practices involved with CI\/CD, Continuous Testing\/Security and Continuous. Monitoring\/Observability.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Engage with your quality assurance function team focusing on a strategy to improve performance and system stability across a multitude of 3rd party SaaS and PaaS technologies.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Test automation engineering experience with Selenium and Postman. Worksoft knowledge is a plus.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Experience testing Web Applications in cross-browser and cross-device using automated test tools.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Experience with developing both front-end and back-end automation tests.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Knowledge in agile methodologies.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Proficient with various testing phases, Functional Testing, Regression Testing and UAT.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good Knowledge in ADO.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Solves complex problems with minimal guidance.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;strong&gt;About you:&lt;br&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/br&gt;&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;strong&gt;You&#39;re a fit for the role of Senior QA Engineer if your background includes:&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Have 7 to 10 years experience and a great understanding of both coding and software design principles.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Experience working in the public clouds (AWS, Azure, GCP) along with at least one or more programming languages (Java, Python, node.js, etc).&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Have an understanding of developing automated test scripts using test automation tools &amp; frameworks such as QTP\/UFT, Selenium, Worksoft.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Engages with cross functional teams to execute end to end tests.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Trains and mentors more junior colleagues.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Influences and articulates compelling QA solutions for customers and product(s).&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Explains difficult concepts and influences others to adopt a point of view for ideas and initiatives.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;You will join our inclusive culture of world-class talent, where we are committed to your personal and professional growth through:&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Hybrid Work Model:&lt;\/strong&gt; We&#39;ve adopted a flexible hybrid working environment (2-3 days a week in the office depending on the role) for our office-based roles while delivering a seamless experience that is digitally and physically connected.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Wellbeing:&lt;\/strong&gt; Engineering(Automation,Java,Selenium)&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What does a successful Tester do at Fiserv&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Responsible designing and executing Automation test cases&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Work closely with business analysts, developers, and QAs to test software and ensure quality.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understand business requirements and translate them into Automation test cases.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Automate the test cases using Selenium with Java&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What You will do:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Work closely with Developers, Business Analysts and participate in the product design process including specification and other document reviews.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Provide risk assessments and impact analysis for areas of responsibility.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Support and get involved early in the product development cycle and continuing through product deployment.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What you will need to have:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;3-8 years of Experience in Automation testing.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Ability to Automate test cases in Selenium Automation tool using Java&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good knowledge of database queries, JIRA tool&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good Knowledge of Payments Domain&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Perform API testing to validate backend functionality, integration points, and data consistency using tools such as Postman or REST Assured.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Integrate automated tests into the CI\/CD pipeline for continuous testing and deployment, and collaborate with the development team to ensure smooth delivery of releases.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Act as a Subject Matter Expert (SME) in testing methodologies, tools, and best practices, and provide guidance and mentorship to junior team members.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Manage and maintain test environments, test data, and test infrastructure to support both manual and automated testing efforts.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Participate in code reviews, sprint planning, and retrospective meetings to provide feedback on testability, automation coverage, and overall product quality.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Utilize version control systems such as GIT to manage test scripts, codebase, and test artifacts effectively.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understanding of Defect lifecycle.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understanding of Software testing lifecycle.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good communication skills to speak with the Business Partners is essential and non-negotiable for this position.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What would be great to have:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Preferred degree in Computer Science or related discipline.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Knowledge of Selenium Automation tool.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Knowledge of tools like Azure DevOps, Pipelines, Git Repo, SQL developer.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Prior experience in Payments domain or Banking and Finance domain in general.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Knowledge of Agile methodology and Daily Scrum.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;span&gt;&lt;span&gt;Thank you for considering employment with Fiserv. all innovators - find your future at Fiserv.&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;We&#39;re Fiserv, a global leader in Fintech and payments, and we move money and information in a way Title&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;Professional, Quality Assurance Engineering&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What does a successful Tester do at Fiserv&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Responsible designing and executing Automation test cases&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Work closely with business analysts, cases using Selenium with Java&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What You will do:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Work closely with Developers, Business Analysts and participate in the product design process including specification and other document reviews.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Provide risk assessments and impact analysis for areas of responsibility.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Support and get involved early in the product development cycle and continuing through product deployment.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What you will need to have:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;3-8 years of Experience in Automation testing.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Ability to Automate test cases in Selenium Automation tool using Java&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good knowledge of database queries, JIRA tool&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good Knowledge of Payments Domain&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Perform API testing to validate backend functionality, integration points, and data consistency using tools such as Postman or REST Assured.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Integrate automated tests into the CI\/CD pipeline for continuous testing and deployment, and collaborate with the development team to ensure smooth delivery of releases.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Act as a Subject Matter Expert (SME) in testing methodologies, tools, and best practices, and provide guidance and mentorship to junior team members.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Manage and maintain test environments, test data, and test infrastructure to support both manual and automated testing efforts.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Participate in code reviews, sprint planning, and retrospective meetings to provide feedback on testability, automation coverage, and overall product Banks, Insurance Companies, Exchanges, CCPs, Custodians, Prime Brokers or Treasuries.&lt;div&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;b&gt;Role And Responsibilities :&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;\tExecute test cases and identify, prioritize, and report defects in a clear and concise manner. &lt;br\/&gt;\tCollaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and ensure test coverage. &lt;br\/&gt;\tMentor and guide junior testers in manual testing best practices and methodologies. &lt;br\/&gt;\tParticipate in test strategy discussions and contribute to process improvement initiatives. &lt;br\/&gt;\tReview and validate test results, providing insights and recommendations for improvement. &lt;br\/&gt;\tStay updated with industry trends and emerging technologies to enhance testing practices. &lt;br\/&gt;\tExcellent communication and problem-solving skills to deliver high-quality, reliable testing outcomes. &lt;br\/&gt;\tCoordinate with project stakeholders to define testing scope, objectives, and deliverables. &lt;br\/&gt;\tDevelop and maintain test documentation, including test plans, test cases, and test data. &lt;br\/&gt;\tConduct risk-based testing, prioritizing critical functionalities and scenarios. &lt;br\/&gt;\tPerform regression testing to ensure new features do not adversely impact existing functionality. &lt;br\/&gt;\tCollaborate with developers and product owners to address issues and clarify requirements. &lt;br\/&gt;\tLead test strategy discussions, test reviews, and defect triage meetings. &lt;br\/&gt;\tImplement and maintain testing tools and frameworks to streamline testing processes. &lt;br\/&gt;\tProvide expertise in various testing methodologies and best practices. &lt;br\/&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;Software Test Engineer - methodologies and tools. The candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and executing automated test scripts to ensure the quality of our software products.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Key Responsibilities&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Design and develop automated test scripts using various testing tools and frameworks. &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Execute test cases and report test results to the development team. &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Collaborate with software developers and quality assurance team to identify and resolve bugs. &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Create and maintain test documentation. &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Participate in test planning and strategy sessions. understanding of software testing methodologies and best practices. &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills. &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good communication and teamwork skills. The India planning teams are also embedded with global business units for business planning and analytics.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;ExxonMobil&#39;s LNG affiliate in India supporting the upstream business provides consultant services for other ExxonMobil upstream affiliates and conducts LNG market-development activities.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;The Global Business Center - Technology Center provides a range of technical and business support services for ExxonMobil&#39;s operations around the globe.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;ExxonMobil strives to make a positive contribution to the communities where we operate and its affiliates support a range of education, health and community-building programs in India. team&lt;\/h2&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;span&gt;We are seeking dynamic, creative and resourceful Senior software developer roles for ExxonMobil&#39;s Bengaluru, India location in order to help steer and manage complex software development in the niche subsurface geology team.&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;span&gt;The ideal candidate will need to be able to interface with both business stakeholders, and software developers in order to optimize the workflow performance from both a scientific and software standpoint.&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;span&gt;Job location is based out of Bangalore, Karnataka.&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;h2&gt;What you will do&lt;\/h2&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;span&gt;&lt;span&gt;Be a part of a global software development scrum team.&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;span&gt;&lt;span&gt;Work with stakeholders to better understand subsurface research needs and implement those requirements into working software.&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;span&gt;&lt;span&gt;Exercise skills in software engineering principles and best practices for quality and maintainability, including OOAD, SOLID, software testing, and automation.&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;span&gt;&lt;span&gt;Work independently (due to time zone differences) as well as collaborate with local and remote team members.&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;span&gt;&lt;span&gt;Clearly communicate technical concepts to a diverse audience including developers, research teams, and geoscientists.&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;h2&gt;About They bring solutions every day to optimize our strategy in energy, chemicals, lubricants and lower-emissions technologies.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;We invite you to bring your ideas to ExxonMobil to help create sustainable solutions that improve quality of life and meet society&#39;s evolving needs. Learn more aboutand how we can&lt;b&gt;&lt;\/b&gt;.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;h2&gt;ExxonMobil&#39;s affiliates in India&lt;\/h2&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;span&gt;ExxonMobil&#39;s affiliates have offices in India in Bengaluru, Mumbai and the National Capital Region. &lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;ExxonMobil&#39;s affiliates in India supporting the Product Solutions business engage in the marketing, sales and distribution of performance as well as specialty products across chemicals and lubricants businesses. The India planning teams are also embedded with global business units for business planning and analytics.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;ExxonMobil&#39;s LNG affiliate in India supporting the upstream business provides consultant services for other ExxonMobil upstream affiliates and conducts LNG market-development activities.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;The Global Business Center - Technology Center provides a range of technical and business support services for ExxonMobil&#39;s operations around the globe.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;ExxonMobil strives to make a positive contribution to the communities where we operate and its affiliates support a range of education, health and community-building programs in India. Read more about our &lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;span&gt;To know more about ExxonMobil in India, visit &lt;\/span&gt;&lt;span&gt;and the &lt;\/span&gt;&lt;span&gt;&lt;u&gt;.&lt;\/u&gt;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;h2&gt;What role you will play in our team&lt;\/h2&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;span&gt;We are seeking dynamic, creative and resourceful Senior software developer roles for ExxonMobil&#39;s Bengaluru, India location in order to help steer and manage complex software development in the niche subsurface geology team.&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;span&gt;The ideal candidate will need to be able to interface with both business stakeholders, and software developers in order to optimize the workflow performance from both a scientific and software standpoint.&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;span&gt;Job location is based out of Bangalore, Karnataka.&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;h2&gt;What you will do&lt;\/h2&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;span&gt;&lt;span&gt;Be a part of a global software development scrum team.&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;span&gt;&lt;span&gt;Work with stakeholders to better understand subsurface research needs and implement those requirements into working software.&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;span&gt;&lt;span&gt;Exercise skills in software engineering principles and best practices for quality and maintainability, including OOAD, SOLID, software testing, and automation.&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;span&gt;&lt;span&gt;Work independently (due to time zone differences) as well as collaborate with local and remote team members.&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;span&gt;&lt;span&gt;Clearly communicate technical concepts to a diverse audience including developers, research teams, and geoscientists.&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;h2&gt;About You&lt;\/h2&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Skills and Qualifications&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;p&gt;Bachelor&#39;s or Master&#39;s degree from a recognized university in Computer\/IT other relevant engineering disciplines with minimum GPA 7.0&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;p&gt;Minimum 1 year of hands on experience of writing a code in an object-oriented programming language such as C#, TypeScript, Python, or equivalent.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;p&gt;Ability to write unit tests and design testable code.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;p&gt;Awareness or exposure to web technologies, including backend REST APIs and front-end frameworks such as Angular.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;p&gt;At least 1 year of experience working as Software Developer.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;p&gt;Ability to debug code to remediate bugs and investigate performance issues.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;p&gt;Experience working with Git repositories, including branching, merging, and resolving conflicts.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;p&gt;Solid math and science background.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Preferred Qualifications\/ Experience&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;p&gt;Writing and maintaining Angular applications.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;p&gt;.NET development, including WPF and ASP.NET web APIs.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;p&gt;The ability to read, debug, and make modifications to existing Python code.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;p&gt;Working knowledge of the Linux command-line (ex: Bash).&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;p&gt;Experience working with resources in Azure.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;p&gt;Experience in basic configuration of IIS.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;p&gt;Experience in working with docker containers and OpenShift.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;p&gt;Developing CI\/CD pipelines through GitHub actions or Working relationships discussed herein do not necessarily represent a reporting connection, but may reflect a functional guidance, stewardship, or service relationship. &lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Exxon Mobil Corporation has numerous affiliates, many with names that include ExxonMobil, Exxon, Esso and Mobil. Engineer&quot;],&quot;maximumSalaryINRFilter&quot;:3750000,&quot;description&quot;:&quot; lt p gt as a  lt strong gt software testing engineer lt \/strong gt , your primary role is to test software stakeholders to understand project requirements and create comprehensive test plans. your goal is to ensure that the software meets quality standards, functions correctly, and delivers a positive user experience. lt \/p gt  lt p gt  lt br gt  lt \/p gt  lt p gt  lt strong gt requirements  lt \/strong gt  lt \/p gt  lt ul gt  lt li gt bachelor s degree in computer science or related field. lt \/li requirements and technologies. lt \/li gt  lt li gt  lt strong gt must have a valid permit to work in australia\/canada or must be ready to secure one.  lt \/strong gt  lt \/li gt  lt \/ul gt  lt p gt lt \/li gt  lt li gt test execution  execute test cases to identify software defects and verify functionality. lt \/li gt  lt li gt bug reporting  document and report bugs using bug tracking systems. lt \/li gt  lt li gt regression testing  ensure software updates do not affect existing features. lt \/li gt  lt li gt quality assurance  verify software meets quality standards and user expectations. lt \/li gt  lt li gt test automation  develop and maintain automated test scripts for efficiency. lt \/li gt  lt li gt collaboration  work with teams to communicate test results and improvements. lt \/li gt  lt li gt documentation  create and update testing documentation for reference. lt \/li gt  lt li gt continuous improvement  stay updated with testing trends and best practices. lt \/li gt  lt lt \/li gt  lt li gt regression testing  ensure software updates do not affect existing features. lt \/li gt  lt li gt quality assurance  verify software meets quality standards and user expectations. Engineering, Information Technology or Business-related degree preferred or equivalent experience&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;strong&gt;What&#39;s in it For You&lt;br&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/br&gt;&lt;\/strong&gt;You will join our inclusive culture of world-class talent, where we are committed to your personal and professional growth through:&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Hybrid Work Model: Weve adopted a flexible hybrid working environment (2-3 days a week in the office depending on the role) for our office-based roles while delivering a seamless experience that is digitally and physically connected&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Wellbeing: Comprehensive benefit plans; flexible and supportive benefits for work-life balance: flexible vacation, two company-wide Mental Health Days Off; work from another location for up to a total of 8 weeks in a year, 4 of those weeks can be out of the country and the remaining in the country, Headspace app subscription; retirement, savings, tuition reimbursement, and employee incentive programs; resources for mental, physical, and financial wellbeing.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Culture: Globally recognized and award-winning reputation for equality, diversity and inclusion, flexibility, work-life balance, and more.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Learning &amp; Development: LinkedIn Learning access; internal Talent Marketplace with opportunities to work on projects cross-company; Ten Thousand Coffees Thomson Reuters café networking.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Social Impact: Ten employee-driven Business Resource Groups; two paid volunteer days annually; Environmental, Social and Governance (ESG) initiatives for local and global impact.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Purpose Driven Work: We have a superpower that weve never talked about with as much pride as we should  we are one of the only companies on the planet that helps its customers pursue justice, truth and transparency. Together, with the professionals and institutions we serve, we help uphold the rule of law, turn the wheels of commerce, catch bad actors, report the facts, and provide trusted, unbiased information to people all over the world.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;Do you want to be part of a team helping re-invent the way knowledge professionals work How about a team that works every day to create a more transparent, just and inclusive future At Thomson Reuters, weve been doing just that for almost 160 years. Our industry-leading products and services include highly specialized information-enabled software and tools for legal, tax, accounting and compliance professionals combined with the worlds most global news services  Reuters. We help these professionals do their jobs better, creating more time for them to focus on the things that matter most: advising, advocating, negotiating, governing and informing.&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;We are powered by the talents of 26,000 employees across more than 70 countries, where everyone has a chance to contribute and grow professionally in flexible work environments that celebrate diversity and inclusion. At a time when objectivity, accuracy, fairness and transparency are under attack, we consider it our duty to pursue them. Sound exciting Join us and help shape the industries that move society forward.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Accessibility &lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/strong&gt;As a global business, we rely on diversity of culture and thought to deliver on our goals. Career Area: &lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;\/p&gt; Engineering &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt; Job Description: &lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt; Your Work Shapes the World at Caterpillar Inc. &lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt; When you join Caterpillar, you&#39;rejoining a global team who cares not just about the work we do - but also about each other. We are the makers, problem solvers, and future world builders who are creating stronger, more sustainable communities. We don&#39;tjust talk about progress and innovation here - we make it happen, with our customers, where we work and live. Together, we are building a better world, so we can all enjoy living in it. &lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt; Job Duties\/Responsibilities may include, but are not limited to: &lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt; Define battery control strategy requirements and develop software features using tools like Matlab\/Simulink\/Simscape &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt; Develop test plans from software requirements and specifications &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt; Perform Black box testing and White box testing using simulators like Opal-RT, dSPACE, etc &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt; Run and execute battery test plans in battery cell simulators and HIL benches &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt; Modify and convert battery simulation models using MATLAB\/Simulink tools for HIL Bench &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt; Develop automation scripts using Python and other tools &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt; Perform complex analysis, identify, and solve challenging battery controls software problems. &lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt; Basic Qualifications: &lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt; Bachelor&#39;s degree in Electrical\/Electronic\/ Mechanical Engineering &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt; 3 to 8 years experience with HIL testing, battery controls validation or modelling &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt; Experience in debugging and running test cases on Battery cell simulators and other HIL simulators &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt; Experience in plant model integration using tools like Matlab\/Simulink, RT-Sim, GT-Power, Vector Canape, etc &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt; Experience and knowledge with Controls SW development and Validation &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt; Top Candidates Will Also Have: &lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt; Experience and knowledge with Battery Management control system and battery software validation using HIL Benches &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt; Master&#39;s degree in an accredited Indian or Global Engineering schools &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt; Good knowledge of simulation tools like Simscape electrical etc &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt; Good knowledge on Software testing and scripting tools like Canalyzer. Python, etc &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt; Excellent analytical and communication skills &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt; Self-starter with strong technical leadership skills &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt; Enjoys working in a fast paced, technically challenging environment &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt; Relocation is available for this position. &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt; Posting Dates: &lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;\/p&gt; July 10, 2024 - July 17, 2024 &lt;p&gt; Caterpillar is an Equal Opportunity Employer (EEO). &lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt; organization&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Responsibilities:&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Reviewing software requirements\/user stories and preparing test scenarios&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Executing tests(Manual\/Automated) on software usability&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;All levels of testing (System, Integration, and Regression)&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Design and develop automation scripts when needed&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Preparing reports on all aspects related to the software testing carried out and reporting to all stakeholders. &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Interacting with clients to understand product requirements. &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Participating in design reviews and providing input on requirements, product design, and potential problems. &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Apply quality engineering principals throughout the Agile product lifecycle&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Provide support and documentation&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Software Tester Requirements:&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;3-5 years of experience as a Software Tester or similar role&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;A bachelor&#39;s degree in Engineering\/Science. &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Up-to-date knowledge of software test design and testing methodologies. &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Working knowledge of test techniques(Manual \u0026 Automated) and compatibility with various software programs. &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Testing experience in manufacturing or supply chain domain is preferred&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Working knowledge of programming. &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Excellent communication and critical thinking skills. &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good organizational skills and detail-oriented mindset. &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Ability to handle multiple tasks simultaneously&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Sense of ownership and pride in your performance and its impact on the company&#39;s success&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Critical thinker and problem-solving skills&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Great interpersonal and communication skills&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;Drive your career forward and join the company leading the technology and business evolution in the automotive develop automation scripts when needed&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Preparing reports on all aspects related to the software testing carried out and reporting to all stakeholders. &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Interacting with clients to understand product requirements. &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Participating in design reviews and providing input on requirements, product design, and potential problems. &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Apply quality engineering principals throughout the Agile product lifecycle&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Provide support and documentation&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Software Tester Requirements:&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;3-5 years of experience as a chain domain is preferred&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Working knowledge of programming. &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Excellent communication and critical thinking skills. &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good organizational skills and detail-oriented mindset. &lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Ability to handle multiple tasks simultaneously&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Sense of ownership and pride in your performance and its impact on the company&#39;s success&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Critical thinker and problem-solving skills&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Great interpersonal and communication skills&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;Drive your career forward and join the company leading the technology and business evolution in the automotive <div class="searchKeywordContainer">
        <div class="keywordContent">
            <div class="srp-seo-content">
                <h2 class="titleText"><p>Software Testing Opening And Vacancy</p></h2>
                <div class="descriptionText">
                    <p>Software testing jobs are involved with conducting trials of newly developed software for industries ranging from software publishers to video game developers to financial institutions and medical research companies. Testers work with software development teams to detect bugs and performance issues before a product reaches the consumer. Software  testers have the freedom to work as independent contractors too. A job in testing basically requires an associate degree in electronics technology or a related field. International certifications like ISTQB, CSTE, PMP and domain certifications like LOMA, AICPCU, NCFM, AHM helps gain more opportunities than others. There are some prestigious institutes and organizations like International Institute for Software Testing (IIST) and The American Society for Quality which offer certification as a Certified Quality Improvement Associate also known as a CQIA. Alternative careers for a tester would be as a Computer Programmer, web developer, QA Analyst, Sr.QA Analyst, QA team coordinator, Test manager, Sr. Test manager. Prospective tester can pursue automation testing, performance testing and business analysis for a bright career path.</p>
                </div>
            </div>
            <!-- <th:block
                th:if="${queryData[0].containsKey('faq_schema_json_markup')} and ${queryData[0].faq_schema_json_markup} != null"
                th:utext="${seoData.faq_schema_json_markup}">
            </th:block> -->
        </div>

That&#39;s why Googlers build products that help create opportunities for everyone, whether down the street or across the globe. As a Technical Program Manager at Google, you&#39;ll use your technical expertise to lead complex, multi-disciplinary projects from start to finish. You&#39;ll work with stakeholders to plan requirements, identify risks, manage project schedules, and communicate clearly with cross-functional partners across the company. You&#39;re equally comfortable explaining your team&#39;s analyses and recommendations to executives as you are discussing the technical tradeoffs in product development with engineers.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;Our goal is to build a Google that looks like the world around us - and we want Googlers to stay and grow when they join us. As part of our efforts to build a Google for everyone, we build diversity, equity, and inclusion into our work and we aim to cultivate a sense of belonging throughout the company.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Android is the most widely adopted operating system. Pixel devices bring the best of Android, Google Hardware, AI and first-party Apps and experiences to Google users.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Our mission is to deliver high quality and innovative software for the Pixel family of products, covering connectivity, experience, testing, and device software.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;As a Pixel Software Technical Program Manager, in Pixel Test Engineering, you will work with cross-product area\/site\/team to elevate and accelerate test engineering towards Pixel product excellence.&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Google&#39;s mission is to organize the world&#39;s information and make it universally accessible and useful. We research, design, and develop new technologies and hardware to make our user&#39;s interaction with computing faster, seamless, and more powerful. QA Engineers are experienced professionals that develop software programs in order to test code and applications and have a passion for quality processes. They have in-depth knowledge and subject matter expertise in managing functional testing, automating client application and qualification of the client-side applications. Sr. QA Engineers interact with internal and external teams to train them on the products, work on projects independently and collaborate with cross-functional teams to debug and reproduce issues. In this role, you will mentor and guide others in the performance of all testing activities as well as encourage others to grow their skillset. Sr. QA Engineers are creative problem solvers and are involved in continuously driving improvements in test automation frameworks as well as assessing and reporting on the software development processes adopted by projects through audits, reviews and inspections.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;strong&gt;About the role: &lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;strong&gt;In this opportunity as Senior QA Engineer, you are a fit for this position if your background includes:&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Apply your experience of test automation and software engineering best practices to build automated systems for functional and regression testing.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Apply your experience of functional test and software testing guidelines knowledge into various phases of application life cycle.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Investigate, design, configure \/ integrate and test process control solutions to a variety of technical problems.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understand and build automated tests that fit into the bigger picture of software delivery for building CI\/CD pipelines, optimizing the execution of tests, and ensuring that the tests are regularly providing fast and reliable feedback.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Have a deep understanding of modern DevOps development tools and practices involved with CI\/CD, Continuous Testing\/Security and Continuous. Monitoring\/Observability.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Engage with your quality assurance function team focusing on a strategy to improve performance and system stability across a multitude of 3rd party SaaS and PaaS technologies.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Test automation engineering experience with Selenium and Postman. Worksoft knowledge is a plus.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Experience testing Web Applications in cross-browser and cross-device using automated test tools.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Experience with developing both front-end and back-end automation tests.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Knowledge in agile methodologies.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Proficient with various testing phases, Functional Testing, Regression Testing and UAT.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good Knowledge in ADO.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Solves complex problems with minimal guidance.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;strong&gt;About you:&lt;br&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/br&gt;&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;strong&gt;You&#39;re a fit for the role of Senior QA Engineer if your background includes:&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Have 7 to 10 years experience and a great understanding of both coding and software design principles.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Experience working in the public clouds (AWS, Azure, GCP) along with at least one or more programming languages (Java, Python, node.js, etc).&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Have an understanding of developing automated test scripts using test automation tools &amp; frameworks such as QTP\/UFT, Selenium, Worksoft.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Engages with cross functional teams to execute end to end tests.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Trains and mentors more junior colleagues.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Influences and articulates compelling QA solutions for customers and product(s).&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Explains difficult concepts and influences others to adopt a point of view for ideas and initiatives.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;You will join our inclusive culture of world-class talent, where we are committed to your personal and professional growth through:&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Hybrid Work Model:&lt;\/strong&gt; We&#39;ve adopted a flexible hybrid working environment (2-3 days a week in the office depending on the role) for our office-based roles while delivering a seamless experience that is digitally and physically connected.&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Wellbeing:&lt;\/strong&gt; Engineering(Automation,Java,Selenium)&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What does a successful Tester do at Fiserv&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Responsible designing and executing Automation test cases&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Work closely with business analysts, developers, and QAs to test software and ensure quality.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understand business requirements and translate them into Automation test cases.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Automate the test cases using Selenium with Java&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What You will do:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Work closely with Developers, Business Analysts and participate in the product design process including specification and other document reviews.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Provide risk assessments and impact analysis for areas of responsibility.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Support and get involved early in the product development cycle and continuing through product deployment.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What you will need to have:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;3-8 years of Experience in Automation testing.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Ability to Automate test cases in Selenium Automation tool using Java&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good knowledge of database queries, JIRA tool&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good Knowledge of Payments Domain&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Perform API testing to validate backend functionality, integration points, and data consistency using tools such as Postman or REST Assured.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Integrate automated tests into the CI\/CD pipeline for continuous testing and deployment, and collaborate with the development team to ensure smooth delivery of releases.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Act as a Subject Matter Expert (SME) in testing methodologies, tools, and best practices, and provide guidance and mentorship to junior team members.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Manage and maintain test environments, test data, and test infrastructure to support both manual and automated testing efforts.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Participate in code reviews, sprint planning, and retrospective meetings to provide feedback on testability, automation coverage, and overall product quality.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Utilize version control systems such as GIT to manage test scripts, codebase, and test artifacts effectively.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understanding of Defect lifecycle.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Understanding of Software testing lifecycle.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good communication skills to speak with the Business Partners is essential and non-negotiable for this position.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What would be great to have:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Preferred degree in Computer Science or related discipline.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Knowledge of Selenium Automation tool.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Knowledge of tools like Azure DevOps, Pipelines, Git Repo, SQL developer.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Prior experience in Payments domain or Banking and Finance domain in general.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Knowledge of Agile methodology and Daily Scrum.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;span&gt;&lt;span&gt;Thank you for considering employment with Fiserv. all innovators - find your future at Fiserv.&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;We&#39;re Fiserv, a global leader in Fintech and payments, and we move money and information in a way Title&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;Professional, Quality Assurance Engineering&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What does a successful Tester do at Fiserv&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Responsible designing and executing Automation test cases&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Work closely with business analysts, cases using Selenium with Java&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What You will do:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Work closely with Developers, Business Analysts and participate in the product design process including specification and other document reviews.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Provide risk assessments and impact analysis for areas of responsibility.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Support and get involved early in the product development cycle and continuing through product deployment.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;\/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;What you will need to have:&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;3-8 years of Experience in Automation testing.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Ability to Automate test cases in Selenium Automation tool using Java&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good knowledge of database queries, JIRA tool&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Good Knowledge of Payments Domain&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Perform API testing to validate backend functionality, integration points, and data consistency using tools such as Postman or REST Assured.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Integrate automated tests into the CI\/CD pipeline for continuous testing and deployment, and collaborate with the development team to ensure smooth delivery of releases.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Act as a Subject Matter Expert (SME) in testing methodologies, tools, and best practices, and provide guidance and mentorship to junior team members.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Manage and maintain test environments, test data, and test infrastructure to support both manual and automated testing efforts.&lt;\/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Participate in code reviews, sprint planning, and retrospective meetings to provide feedback on testability, automation coverage, and overall product Banks, Insurance Companies, Exchanges, CCPs, Custodians, Prime Brokers or Treasuries.&lt;div&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;b&gt;Role And Responsibilities :&lt;\/b&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;\tExecute test cases and identify, prioritize, and report defects in a clear and concise manner. &lt;br\/&gt;\tCollaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and ensure test coverage. &lt;br\/&gt;\tMentor and guide junior testers in manual testing best practices and methodologies. &lt;br\/&gt;\tParticipate in test strategy discussions and contribute to process improvement initiatives. &lt;br\/&gt;\tReview and validate test results, providing insights and recommendations for improvement. &lt;br\/&gt;\tStay updated with industry trends and emerging technologies to enhance testing practices. &lt;br\/&gt;\tExcellent communication and problem-solving skills to deliver high-quality, reliable testing outcomes. &lt;br\/&gt;\tCoordinate with project stakeholders to define testing scope, objectives, and deliverables. &lt;br\/&gt;\tDevelop and maintain test documentation, including test plans, test cases, and test data. &lt;br\/&gt;\tConduct risk-based testing, prioritizing critical functionalities and scenarios. &lt;br\/&gt;\tPerform regression testing to ensure new features do not adversely impact existing functionality. &lt;br\/&gt;\tCollaborate with developers and product owners to address issues and clarify requirements. &lt;br\/&gt;\tLead test strategy discussions, test reviews, and defect triage meetings. &lt;br\/&gt;\tImplement and maintain testing tools and frameworks to streamline testing processes. &lt;br\/&gt;\tProvide expertise in various testing methodologies and best practices. &lt;br\/&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br\/&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;Software Test Engineer - 	<!-- Loading the common and vendor scripts -->
	
		
		
			<script async type="text/javascript" src="https://media.foundit.in/trex/seo-search/public/theme_2/dist/js/common.js?ver=20240703143718" charset="UTF-8"></script>
			<script async type="text/javascript" src="https://media.foundit.in/trex/seo-search/public/theme_2/dist/js/vendor.js?ver=20240703143718" charset="UTF-8"></script>
		
	
	

	
    	
			
				
					<script defer src="https://media.foundit.in/trex/seo-search/public/theme_2/dist/js/srp.js?ver=20240703143718" charset="UTF-8"></script>
				
				
			
    	
    
    	
			
				
				
					<script>
						_seoJsLinks.push(`//media.foundit.in/trex/seo-search/public/theme_2/dist/js/user-engagement.js?ver=20240703143718`);
					</script>
				
			
    	
    

	<script>
		function postLoadFunction(a) {
			if ("undefined" != typeof (window.attachEvent)) {
				return window.attachEvent("onload", a)
			} else {
				if (window.addEventListener) {
					return window.addEventListener("load", a, false)
				}
			}
		};
		function loadCSSJS() {
			let loginAppServiceJSUrl = '';
			let loginAppServiceCSSUrl = '';
			let jobAlertToggleJSUrl = '';
			let jobAlertToggleCSSUrl = '';
			let profileInspectionApopJSUrl = '';
			let profileInspectionApopCSSUrl = '';
			if(`//media.foundit.in/trex/seo-search`.includes("local")){
				loginAppServiceJSUrl = `https://local.monsterindia.com/rio/public/js/login-app-service.js?ver=20240703143718`;
				jobAlertToggleJSUrl = `https://local.monsterindia.com/srp/js/jobAlertToggle.js?ver=20240703143718`;
				profileInspectionApopJSUrl = `https://local.monsterindia.com/srp/js/profile-inspection-apop.js?ver=20240703143718`;
				// CSS Files
				loginAppServiceCSSUrl = `https://local.monsterindia.com/rio/public/css/login-app-service.css?ver=20240703143718`;
				jobAlertToggleCSSUrl = `https://local.monsterindia.com/srp/css/jobAlertToggle.css?ver=20240703143718`;
				profileInspectionApopCSSUrl = `https://local.monsterindia.com/srp/css/profile-inspection-apop.css?ver=20240703143718`;
			}
			else {
				// JS File
				loginAppServiceJSUrl = `https://media.foundit.in/rio/public/js/login-app-service.js?ver=20240703143718`;
				jobAlertToggleJSUrl = `https://media.foundit.in/trex/search/public/js/jobAlertToggle.js?ver=20240703143718`;
				profileInspectionApopJSUrl = `https://media.foundit.in/trex/search/public/js/profile-inspection-apop.js?ver=20240703143718`;
				// CSS Files
				loginAppServiceCSSUrl = `https://media.foundit.in/rio/public/css/login-app-service.css?ver=20240703143718`;
				jobAlertToggleCSSUrl = `https://media.foundit.in/trex/search/public/css/jobAlertToggle.css?ver=20240703143718`;
				profileInspectionApopCSSUrl = `https://media.foundit.in/trex/search/public/css/profile-inspection-apop.css?ver=20240703143718`;
			}
			const commonJSUrls = [];
			if(_siteProps_.tenant === 'msite' && !(_siteProps_.isMobileView && _siteProps_.category_name !== 'Seo Jd')) {
					commonJSUrls.push(jobAlertToggleJSUrl);
			}
			let JSUrls = _seoJsLinks.concat(commonJSUrls);
			let CSSUrls = [jobAlertToggleCSSUrl];
			const UserJSUrls = [profileInspectionApopJSUrl];
			const UserCSSUrls = [profileInspectionApopCSSUrl];
			const GuestJSUrls = [loginAppServiceJSUrl];
			const GuestCSSUrls = [loginAppServiceCSSUrl];
			if(_isLoggedinUser){
				JSUrls = JSUrls.concat(UserJSUrls);
				CSSUrls = CSSUrls.concat(UserCSSUrls);
			}
			else{
				JSUrls = JSUrls.concat(GuestJSUrls);
				CSSUrls = CSSUrls.concat(GuestCSSUrls);
			}
			JSUrls.forEach((url) => {
				const tag = document.createElement('script');
				tag.type = 'text/javascript';
				if(url.includes('js/jobAlertToggle.js')) {
					tag.onload = () => {
						window.jobAlertToggleScriptLoaded = true;
					}
				}
				tag.src = url;
				const body = document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0];
				url && body.appendChild(tag);
			})
			if(!_loadFilesSync){
				CSSUrls.forEach(url => {
					var link = document.createElement("link");
					link.type = "text/css";
					link.rel = "stylesheet";
					link.href = url; 
					const head = document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0];
					url && head.appendChild(link);
				})
			}
		}
		postLoadFunction(loadCSSJS);
	</script>


    
    	
    		<!-- Footer Content -->

<!-- Google Tag Manager (noscript)-->
<noscript>
    <iframe src="https://www.googletagmanager.com/ns.html?id=GTM-NGL6ZM" height="0" width="0"
        style="display:none;visibility:hidden"></iframe>
</noscript>
<!-- End Google Tag Manager (noscript) -->





<script type="text/javascript"
    charset="utf-8"> (function (g, o) { g[o] = g[o] || function () { (g[o]['q'] = g[o]['q'] || []).push(arguments) }, g[o]['t'] = 1 * new Date })(window, '_googCsa'); </script>
    	
    

	<style>
		.zuno-header {
                z-index: 999;
                position: sticky;
                left: 0;
                top: 0;
                width: 100%;
            }
            p {
                margin-bottom: 0px !important;
            }
	</style>

	<script>
		function loadZunoScript(src,id){
			let scriptEle = document.createElement("script");
			scriptEle.src = src;
			scriptEle.id = id;
			scriptEle.defer = true;
			document.body.appendChild(scriptEle);
		}

		function getCookie(c_name){
			var i,x,y,ARRcookies=document.cookie.split(";");
			for(i=0;i<ARRcookies.length;i++) {
				x=ARRcookies[i].substr(0,ARRcookies[i].indexOf("="));
				y=ARRcookies[i].substr(ARRcookies[i].indexOf("=")+1);
				x=x.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,"");
				if (x==c_name) {
					return unescape(y);
				}
			}
		}

		const client_name = getCookie('client_name');

		if(client_name == 'zuno') {
			let domainUrl = window.location.host.split('.')
			let zuno_script;
			if(domainUrl[0] === 'www') {
				zuno_script = "zuno-foundit"
			}
		    else{
				zuno_script = "zuno"
			}

			let headerScript = 'https://media.foundit.in/'+ zuno_script + '/assets/build/pages/header/js/index.js?ver=' + version
			let footerScript = 'https://media.foundit.in/'+ zuno_script + '/assets/build/pages/footer/js/index.js?ver=' + version
			loadZunoScript(headerScript , "header-script-zuno");
			loadZunoScript(footerScript , "footer-script-zuno");

			let parent_container = document.getElementById('themeDefault');
			let core_header_element = document.getElementById('headerDefault');
			let core_footer = document.getElementsByClassName('monq-footer')[0]
			let header_element = document.createElement("div");
			header_element.id = "zuno-header";
			header_element.classList.add('zuno-header');
            header_element.innerHTML = '<header-zuno></header-zuno>'	
            parent_container.insertBefore(header_element, core_header_element);
			core_header_element.style.display = 'none'
			core_footer.innerHTML =  '<div>'+
									   '<footer-zuno></footer-zuno>'+
									 '</div>';		
		}
	</script>

	
		
		
		
	

</body>
</html>
